about:

GT Legends brings back the legendary spirit of the classic muscle 
car era. It features all the legends of classic car racing -- from the
famous Mini Cooper team to the muscular Corvette Stingray team.
Collect more then 90 original FiA GTC-TC team vehicles and demonstrate 
your driving skill on real European racetracks. Completely authentic sounds
recorded from the actual FIA racing cars In Multiplayer Mode, you'll impress
your friends with rare unlockable cars, as you challenge up to 15 opponents 
online, which is as always UnTested!, so cry elsewhere if doesnt work!.

Features:
- Racing simulation game with legendary cars of the 60's and 70's
- Collect 90+ original FIA GTC-TC team vehicles; 5 difficulty levels
- 25+ variations of real tracks like Imola, Monza , Donington, and
- Mondello Park
- Leading-edge graphics technology; authentic sounds for exceptional
- realism, note:> even after all the years!.
- Challenge up to 15 opponents online ( UnTested ).


.: install :.

1.: unrar with latest winrar or use 7zip!.

2.: double click: > GToeD.exe < ( must be done )

3.: double click: > MakeDesktopIcon.exe < and run game with it.
